title: Wooden harp
data:
| ( [![Harp.png](/images/4/4e/Harp.png)](/wiki/File:Harp.png) |                                  |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| Name                                                        | wooden harp                      |
| Appearance                                                  | [harp](/wiki/Harp "Harp")        |
| Base price                                                  | 50 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") |
| Weight                                                      | [30](/wiki/Weight "Weight")      |
| Material                                                    | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")        |
| Monster use                                                 | *Will not be used by monsters.*  |

A **wooden harp** is a type of [musical instrument](/wiki/Musical_instrument "Musical instrument") that appears in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*. It is [tonal](/wiki/Tonal "Tonal") and made of [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood"), and appears as just a [harp](/wiki/Harp "Harp") when unidentified. For [Samurai](/wiki/Samurai "Samurai"), the wooden harp is called a **koto**.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Description](#Description)

- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [4 History](#History)

- [5 Messages](#Messages)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [6.3 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [6.4 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [7 References](#References)

## Generation

[Elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") [Priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest") and [Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") have a 1⁄6 chance of starting the game with a wooden harp.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Description

[Applying](/wiki/Apply "Apply") a wooden harp will let you play it, either through improvising or playing specific notes - this has no effect beyond exercising [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity").[\[2\]](#cite_note-2) If you are not [confused](/wiki/Confused "Confused"), there is a dexterity-based chance that you will instead play "a lilting melody" that pacifies any [nymphs](/wiki/Nymph "Nymph") nearby.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)

## Strategy

The wooden harp is relatively easy to distinguish from a [magic harp](/wiki/Magic_harp "Magic harp") by the messages produced when playing it, and can safely be played to do so - playing a magic harp with charges produces "very attractive music" and tames nearby monsters.

As a tonal instrument, a wooden harp can also be used to play the [passtune](/wiki/Passtune "Passtune") to enter the [Castle](/wiki/Castle "Castle"). Outside of this, they are mainly used as [polyfodder](/wiki/Polyfodder "Polyfodder").

## History

The wooden harp first appears in [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0").

## Messages

- The harp twangs.

  You applied a wooden harp and improvised with it.

- You extract a strange sound from the harp!

  You applied a wooden harp and played a specific melody with it.

- The harp produces a lilting melody.

  As above, but this also pacifies any nearby nymphs.

- The \<nymph> listens cheerfully to the music, then seems quieter.

  A nymph in your range of vision was pacified by the wooden harp.

- You feel soothing vibrations.

  You applied a wooden harp while [deaf](/wiki/Deaf "Deaf").

## Variants

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), a wooden harp can be [upgraded](/wiki/Upgraded "Upgraded") into a magic harp.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the [Troubadour](/wiki/Troubadour "Troubadour") role starts with knowledge of the wooden harp and a 1⁄2 chance of their starting tonal instrument being a wooden harp.

The wooden harp is the preferred instrument for playing Lullaby, Meditative Healing, Lethargy, and Friendship via the Troubadour's musicalize spell [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill").

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [SpliceHack-Rewrite](/wiki/SpliceHack-Rewrite "SpliceHack-Rewrite"), a wooden harp can be combined with a [scroll of taming](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a magic harp.

### SlashTHEM

[SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") retains the ability to upgrade wooden harps into magic ones. In addition, the Bard role starts with knowledge of the wooden harp and a 1⁄2 chance of starting with one, as in dNetHack.

The wooden harp is the preferred instrument for playing Lullaby via the musicalize spell skill, and is an alternate instrument for playing Drowsiness. In addition, the Bard [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") [The Lyre of Orpheus](/wiki/The_Lyre_of_Orpheus "The Lyre of Orpheus") is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") wooden harp (rather than a magic harp as in dNetHack).

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 814](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L814)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/music.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 630](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/music.c#L630): *`case WOODEN_HARP`*
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/music.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 148](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/music.c#L148): *`calm_nymphs(distance)`*
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/music.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 631](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/music.c#L631): *The sum of your [experience level](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level") and a randomly rolled number between 0 and your current dexterity stat must exceed 25*

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Wooden harp

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
(
Name wooden harp
Appearance harp
Base price 50 zm
Weight 30
Material wood
Monster use Will not be used by monsters.

A wooden harp is a type of musical instrument that appears in NetHack. It is tonal and made of wood, and appears as just a harp when unidentified. For Samurai, the wooden harp is called a koto.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 History
  • 5 Messages
  • 6 Variants
    • 6.1 SLASH'EM
    • 6.2 dNetHack
    • 6.3 SpliceHack
    • 6.4 SlashTHEM
  • 7 References

Generation

Elven Priests and Wizards have a 1⁄6 chance of starting the game with a wooden harp.[1]

Description

Applying a wooden harp will let you play it, either through improvising or playing specific notes - this has no effect beyond exercising dexterity.[2] If you are not confused, there is a dexterity-based chance that you will instead play "a lilting melody" that pacifies any nymphs nearby.[3][4]

Strategy

The wooden harp is relatively easy to distinguish from a magic harp by the messages produced when playing it, and can safely be played to do so - playing a magic harp with charges produces "very attractive music" and tames nearby monsters.

As a tonal instrument, a wooden harp can also be used to play the passtune to enter the Castle. Outside of this, they are mainly used as polyfodder.

History

The wooden harp first appears in NetHack 3.0.0.

Messages

The harp twangs.
You applied a wooden harp and improvised with it.
You extract a strange sound from the harp!
You applied a wooden harp and played a specific melody with it.
The harp produces a lilting melody.
As above, but this also pacifies any nearby nymphs.
The <nymph> listens cheerfully to the music, then seems quieter.
A nymph in your range of vision was pacified by the wooden harp.
You feel soothing vibrations.
You applied a wooden harp while deaf.

Variants

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, a wooden harp can be upgraded into a magic harp.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the Troubadour role starts with knowledge of the wooden harp and a 1⁄2 chance of their starting tonal instrument being a wooden harp.

The wooden harp is the preferred instrument for playing Lullaby, Meditative Healing, Lethargy, and Friendship via the Troubadour's musicalize spell skill.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack and SpliceHack-Rewrite, a wooden harp can be combined with a scroll of taming at a furnace to create a magic harp.

SlashTHEM

SlashTHEM retains the ability to upgrade wooden harps into magic ones. In addition, the Bard role starts with knowledge of the wooden harp and a 1⁄2 chance of starting with one, as in dNetHack.

The wooden harp is the preferred instrument for playing Lullaby via the musicalize spell skill, and is an alternate instrument for playing Drowsiness. In addition, the Bard quest artifact The Lyre of Orpheus is an artifact wooden harp (rather than a magic harp as in dNetHack).

References

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 814
  2. ↑ src/music.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 630: case WOODEN_HARP
  3. ↑ src/music.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 148: calm_nymphs(distance)
  4. ↑ src/music.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 631: The sum of your experience level and a randomly rolled number between 0 and your current dexterity stat must exceed 25
